```{r}
nba_data <- read.csv("nba2024.csv", header = T)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = nba_data,
       aes(x = G)) +
         geom_histogram(fill = "pink", color = "white") +
  xlab("Games Played") +
  ylab("Frequency")
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = nba_data,
       aes(x = Pos)) +
  geom_bar(fill = "light blue", color = "white") +
  labs(title = "Frequency of NBA Players'
Positions, 2024", x = "Positions", y = "Frequency") +
  coord_flip() +
  theme(title = element_text(size = 15))
```
